0;0;"villager_hunting_wolves.png";0;"An adventurer here
column2: what a pleasure! I have a mission for you: I need Worg Skins
column3: so my wife will make coats from them for my family this winter.

column1: However
column2: I don't even know how to fight against humans
column3: so it would be difficult for me to collect those Skins. Could you do it for me please?

column1: Don't worry
column2: you will be rewarded: my grandfather died a long time ago
column3: but recently I remembered that he gave me as a legacy this Sun Wand.

column1: I don't think I will do anything with it
column2: so it is better that if it goes to someone which needs it.";"It is not enough:

column1: we are eight in the same house
column2: so we need one Skin per person.";"That is perfect: with those Skins
column3: we are ready to

column1: face winter! Thank you adventurer
column2: you saved us! I give you this object
column3: inherited from my grandfather:

column1: I know that you will use it well
column2: and I am sure that grandpa would agree."

column1: 0;1;"young_adventurer.png";1;"Another person ! I'm saved ! Me and my friend are young and unexperimented adventurers.
Sadly
column2: too much unexperimented : my friend was killed by a pack of Wolves !

column1: I wished to avenge him
column2: but they are too strong and numerous for me.

column1: I don't care about money : I'll offer you everything I obtained in this dungeon.
Just avenge my friend please !";"You didn't kill all of them: I can always hear them roaring !
I didn't sleep since the day my friend died
column2: because I hear this horrible sound while trying to sleep... They follow me in my nightmares... They are in my head!

column1: AAAAAAAAAH! *it looks like he has an anxiety attack*";"You did
column2: it's marvellous! For me
column3: this day is when my journey as an adventurer ends:

column1: I will come back to my parent's farm and I will help them. As I said
column2: I don't care about money: I give you everything we obtained in this dungeon
column3: as a reward.

column1: I would never thank you as much as I should. If you still want being an adventurer
column2: may the odds be ever in your favor!"

column1: 1;0;"afraid_of_minotaures.jpg";2;"Hero ! I'm glad to see you ! I came here by accident but I cannot leave :
I'm afraid of Minotaures !
Could you kill some of them please?
It would be easier for me to leave.
You'll be rewarded of course!";"Please help me!
Kill some Minautores so I will be able to move and leave!";"Thank you hero! The area around is now safer!
Here is your reward: you deserved it!"
1;1;"wizard.jpg";3;"Greetings
column2: noble fighter ! A client commanded me a potion.

column1: It is almost up
column2: but I miss one ingredient ! I hoped that you could help me. Don't worry
column3: there is nothing dangerous...

column1: I need you to kill Minotaures and bring me back their foots.
Do you accept ?";"Why are you still there
column2: you lazybones!

column1: It's not enough
column2: go back and bring me more!";"Ah
column3: finally you completed your quest! I have enough feet to prepare many potions now.

column1: Well done
column2: I was sure that you would die! A promise is a promise: your gold account will thank me."

column1: 2;0;"blacksmith.png";4;"Oh
column2: greetings warrior! I have lost my unique hammer
column3: I think I left it in a container

column1: Can you bring it back to me please?";"I have forgotten to prevent you: I have also lost the key of this container!
I have seen a Goblin walking with it. Just kill him and you will be able to open the container!";"Thank you foreigner!
With your help
column2: I found my hammer! In recognition for that
column3: I offer you a hammer!

column1: *He sees someone else* Hey you there! I have lost my hammer!"
2;1;"swindler.png";5;"Hello foreigner! Are you interested by a quest? And moreover
column2: by a huge treasure? Let me narrate you a story which happened here.

column1: Few weeks ago
column2: a king and his father-in-law came here to search a treasure protected by Goblins.

column1: Nonetheless
column2: as they were going to leave the dungeon
column3: one of them dropped off the bag where the treasure was and he forgot it!

column1: Sadly
column2: Goblins got back the treasure
column3: so if you want it
column4: you will have to kill them.

column1: Do you accept?";"You didn't find it? It's not a surprise:
the two people I talked you about came back to recover the bag
column2: but neither did they.";"Actually
column3: Goblins did not have the bag: I did. Indeed
column5: however I could not leave because of the great number of Goblins.

column1: I needed you to kill them
column2: so I can leave: thank you hero! And
column3: here is the bag: don't forget it!"

column1: 3;0;"bard.jpg";6;"What a nice surprise: an adventurer! You probably don't know who I am:
my name is not important
column2: I am only a bard who is not very popular...

column1: *he continues talking during a long time*
... and I understood that it was because the stories I narrated were not very interesting
so I came here hoping to meet a hero and see him while he is fighting. Moreover
column2: I am always looking for having new

column1: instruments
column2: and I think that some Skeleton bones would be a quite good material for that. So could you bring me back

column1: some of them please? I will offer you this item I found.";"It is not enough hero: I need more bones.
My future public want me to innovate !";"That's perfect
column2: I have everything I need. Thank you hero
column3: I knew that I could trust you!

column1: For your efforts
column2: I want you to take this: it would be more helpful for you than for me.

column1: And it's not all: while you were fighting
column2: I wrote my new song! It talks about you
column3: so you will be the first one to hear it:

column1: *The bard begins singing with his strident voice*"
3;1;"adventurer.jpg";7;"Hero! I need your help! I came in this dungeon because I was in search of a treasure map: I found a parchment
but before I could even see what was written on
column2: I was attacked by wolves! Injuried by them
column3: I was only able to fly

column1: but the parchment has been ripped! Please help me
column2: find all pieces of parchment
column3: and I will reward you with this Moon Wand!

column1: According to what I heard about it
column2: two twin wands were created: the Sun and the Moon ones. Each of them is powerful

column1: but when they are gathered
column2: it gives incredible skills to his owner! It can be false of course
column3: but I don't know anything about magic

column1: so I cannot say. Are you interested in?";"Please hero
column2: find all the pieces:

column1: I came here just to find this map
column2: so help me!";"Unbelievable
column3: you collected all of the pieces! Now let's gather them
column4: so we will be able to read the parchment.

column1: 'ine
column2: K g'
column3: 'amin

column1: Give me time please: it is not easy to reassembly the parchment!
*After a few moments....*
It is done! I can read what is written:
...'Enzo
column2: Benjamin
column3: Aline
column5: Nicolas and Xavier thank you for having played!'...

column1: Well
column2: sadly there is nothing interesting. Thank you anyway: as promised you can have this Moon Wand."
